name: Attack Increase
description: Increases attack power. Stacks with other upgrades.

name: Affinity Increase
description: Increases affinity. Stacks with other upgrades.

name: Defense Increase
description: Increases defense and adds a chance to reduce damage taken each time you receive damage. Defense stacks with other upgrades, Divine Blessing does not.

name: Slot Upgrade
description: Adds an extra slot. Stack with other upgrades to increase the slot's level.

name: Health Regen
description: Regain health as you land attacks. Stack with other upgrades to increase the amount of health regained.
